QmfNyNy72CTEDZL4d38vxhEcMuoVSPqZYigSWCPS.name: YIP-8: 取消Yip-2中额外增发一百万YAM的提议
QmfNyNy72CTEDZL4d38vxhEcMuoVSPqZYigSWCPS.body:
摘要：
此提案将从YIP-1中删除100万个YAM社区基金，使YAM的供应量恢复到最初的500万个YAM。
 
动机：
-这100万个YAM社区基金将使YAM的供应量立即增加20％从最初的YAM v1供应500万。供应的突然增加对YAM的价格是不利的，并且是不必要的。
-YAM已经拥有了一个国库，可以用来资助社区基金可以进行的所有相同的工作，而同时又不会增加YAM的供应。
-使用财政部可以从第一天开始就实行强制财务责任，社区可以是用财政部中积累的资金用于支出，而不是通过通货膨胀提供资金。
-YAM v1财政部能够在第一年中累积将近100万美元的yCRV 2个基准。几次积极的rebase后，财政部将有足够的资金来为这项工作提供资金，而无需另外的备用资金。

QmNvATiSgHPcLzqA8Mp6JNfu4mxfS9azSvtrQf1S.name: 1% of YAM Treasury Inflows => Gitcoin Grants Matching Pool
QmNvATiSgHPcLzqA8Mp6JNfu4mxfS9azSvtrQf1S.body:
This proposal, if ratified, would redirect 1% of all inflows to the treasury to a [Gitcoin Grants Wallet](https://etherscan.io/address/0x232C95A72F132392171831cEcEc8c1161975c398), in order to support public goods in the Ethereum ecosystem. If ratified, every funding from the YAM treasury that went to the Gitcoin Grants wallet would be 100% used for public goods funding for the Ethereum ecosystem.  This funding would be allocated to the [*Tech* Grants](https://gitcoin.co/grants/tech?) category.

This proposal was motivated by [a tweet from Nick Dodson](https://twitter.com/iamnickdodson/status/1294264371489767424?s=21 ).  There is plenty of discussion on that thread to checkout as you weigh your votes.

For the uninitiated, Gitcoin Grants is like a crypto-style patreon, powered by [Quadratic Funding](https://wtfisqf.com), that has [delivered over $2.5mm of funding to Ethereum projects since Jan 2019](https://gitcoin.co/results).  For more on Gitcoin, checkout these reviews of Gitcoin Grants and QF 
- [Round 3 Review](https://vitalik.ca/general/2019/10/24/gitcoin.html)
- [Round 4 Review](https://vitalik.ca/general/2020/01/28/round4.html)
- [Round 5 Reveiew](https://vitalik.ca/general/2020/04/30/round5.html)
- [Round 6 Review](https://vitalik.ca/general/2020/07/21/round6.html)

There are many promising projects in the community that support public goods (like ETH1/ETH2 development, L2 research, media, education, etc).  Given Gitcoin's long history of successfully supporting public goods on Ethereum at scale, without being captured, through a tough bear market, I believe Gitcoin is the strongest contender at the current moment, in this category.

There are two main reasons that I believe this is a good idea for the YAM community:
1.  **Karma** -- Gitcoin Grants played a part in funding the transition form v1 => v2 [see this link](https://gitcoin.co/grants/1059/yam-protocol-audit). 
2. **High ROI Community Goodwill & Publicity**.  We can shift the narrative around YAMs being a "degen" project to having some "regen" effects to the ecosystem, like funding the base layer upon which it depends.  This will make YAMs part of the broader conversation around [rainbow colored money](https://thedefiant.substack.com/p/rainbow-colored-money-the-story-behind) in the Ethereum ecosystem, and public goods funding in the information age.

If this proposal passes, I will commit to the following:
1. 100% of the tokens that go to this wallet from the YAM contracts will be sent to public goods (minus gas fees, which I expect to be fairly negligible).
2. Prominently listing YAMs as a co-funder of Gitcoin Grants Rounds, for each round it contributes funding.
3. I would be happy to provide a report back to the YAM community on where the YAM funds went, once per quarter, for every quarter in which the value that the YAM system provided to Gitcoin Grants was more than $10k USD.

I appreciate the consideration that the community has given to this proposal
Gitcoin Founder, [Kevin Owocki](https://twitter.com/owocki)

QmRMxkq98LJhFqJAC5GNCHrCwe3FFzxveb7MPzLY.name: YIP-1: 提案机制
QmRMxkq98LJhFqJAC5GNCHrCwe3FFzxveb7MPzLY.body:
Trent Elmore，Brock Elmore，Will Price，Clinton Bembrey和Dan Elitzer提出了以下条例，以作为从YAMv2到YAMv3过渡期间的提案机制。如果该提案获得通过，则与这些机制不符的过去和未来的提案都将被视为无效。
 
尽管Yam的原始发布者将提交提案，但该框架旨在明确表明符合最低要求的任何人都是能够提交提案，其中一些提案可能会取代我们的提案。 YAM的力量和价值来自于YAM社区，我们很高兴看到该社区在此过渡时期和YAMv3中提出的方案。
 
请注意，任何提案都必须在获得YAM社区批准的情况下才能实施。 
 
我们也对DeFi社区中许多人的支持感到非常高兴和谦虚。我们要特别感谢建立并托管此治理门户的Balancer和Snapshot Labs团队。这不是他们必须要做的，而是在我们寻求一个对于投票本影响很小的方法时慷慨地提供。
 
条例1：
 
我们建议最少投票期为3天，最长投票期为7天。这将确保令牌持有人有足够的时间评估提案和投票，同时也确保了有效的流程。
 
条例2：
 
我们建议所有提案必须在2020年9月7日之前截止，以确保有足够的时间编写代码审核前实施。这意味着可以提交提案的最晚日期是2020年9月4日。
 
条例3：

我们建议必须在YAMv3治理中重新提交所有未在截止日期之前批准的提案，以重新考虑实施。
 
 条例 4：
 
我们建议至少需要100 YAMv2才能提交提案。这是为了防止过多提案并确保有效的V2到V3治理流程。
 
条例5：
 
我们建议利用最初在V1中设置的4％法定要求来批准YAMv2治理决策。
 
条例6 ：
 
我们建议在提交投标时，必须选择余额快照的区块高度。余额的快照将成为投票权的基础。提案开始时间（+/- 15分钟）时，该区块必须是当前区块。即使提案获得足够的票数，任何被发现不这样做的提案也会被忽略并视为无效。
 
条例7：
 
我们建议，如果批准的提案相互冲突，则应优先考虑最近通过的提案。

QmPGriN6d3TuWhFunvj3Qyf8ZMBhB3pBidDiWRg9.name: YIP-10: 使用 80/20 平衡池治理社区
QmPGriN6d3TuWhFunvj3Qyf8ZMBhB3pBidDiWRg9.body:
该提议将把治理从YAM转移到具有80％YAM / 20 WETH的平衡器池中使用BPT，类似于此处概述的Aave的新治理系统-https://medium.com/aave/aavenomics-eeab650cccc2。该建议还将在重新设置基准的过程中向该重新定序器添加功能以在该池上调用gulp（）。这将使添加到池中的流动资金在重新定基期间不会丢失资金。该建议不包括向该池中的有限合伙人提供的任何其他激励措施。
 
原因：
这将大大增加现有系统中的YAM交易流动性，在该系统中，人们必须将YAM放在钱包中才能参与治理。 LP只需在平衡器池中收取1％的适度费用，就可以合理地预期仅凭费用一个三位数的APY。将YAM列入每周BAL奖励也很容易。在重置基准期间调用gulp（）可以防止LP资金被盗，就像在平衡器上重新标记令牌的情况一样。
 
这将是一种新颖的治理方法，但其好处是可观的。治理参与者会看到非常高的APY，同时会大大增加交易的YAM流动性，并且不需要YAM协议方面的激励。

QmadvwZAU89wVLNd4KCVvq6iNmtZgECd3qBQbao1.name: Limiting the LP Incentives in v3
QmadvwZAU89wVLNd4KCVvq6iNmtZgECd3qBQbao1.body:
We propose limiting the total number of YAMv3 tokens distributed to YAMv3 liquidity providers to be no greater than 10% of the YAMv2 supply.

The circulating supply of YAMv2 tokens is approximately 3,726,411. YIP-2 (https://snapshot.page/#/yam/proposal/Qmc1GpiLaPXRLsXw31R1RznKrMTnzmonbSn2kCXVwxUWTV) would inflate the token supply by almost 30% (1,100,000 YAMv3 tokens). 

While we acknowledge the importance of incentivizing liquidity provision, early investors and early token holders should not be heavily diluted. Therefore, we propose limiting the total number of YAMv3 tokens distributed to YAMv3 LPs to be no larger than 10% of the YAMv2 supply. This would keep the doors open for the public, while protecting the current token holders from inflation.

For example, if the migration is 1:1, the total number of YAMv3 tokens distributed to YAMv3 LPs will be capped at approximately 372,641.

Qmcu2TaBUobiC1uqsZru7gtDaz1foQxZjN6ZGCme.name: Create 80/20 YAM/WETH Balancer Pool To Use for Governance
Qmcu2TaBUobiC1uqsZru7gtDaz1foQxZjN6ZGCme.body:
Summary:
This proposal would shift governance away from YAM to instead use BPT from a balancer pool with 80% YAM/20 WETH similar to Aave's new governance system outlined here - https://medium.com/aave/aavenomics-eeab650cccc2. This proposal would also add functionality to the rebaser to call gulp() on this pool during rebase. This would make liquidity added to the pool safe from losing funds during rebase. This proposal does not include any additional incentives to be provided to LPs on this pool.

Reasoning:
This would massively increase YAM trading liquidity over the current system where people must hold YAM in their wallet to participate in governance. With a modest fee of 1% on the balancer pool, LP's can reasonably expect a three figure APY from fees alone. It would be easy to get YAM whitelisted for weekly BAL rewards as well. Calling gulp() during rebase will protect LP funds from being stolen as is typically the case with rebasing tokens on balancer. 

This would be a novel approach to governance but the benefits are significant. Governance participants would see a very high APY while significantly increasing YAM liquidity for trading and it requires no incentive on the part of YAM protocol.

QmYGwg7yWJddFb85gdxt16CAeNthVecoYMe18zVF.name: YIP-9: Add support for calling sync() on the ETH-YAMv3 Uniswap pool
QmYGwg7yWJddFb85gdxt16CAeNthVecoYMe18zVF.body:
Summary: 
This proposal would add functionality to the rebaser to call `sync()` on the ETH-YAMv3 Uniswap pool during rebase. This would make liquidity added to that pool safe from losing funds during rebase. This proposal does not include any additional incentives to be provided to LPs on this pool.

Reasoning:
Due to the fact that Uniswap tracks token balances internally, assets that rebase (like YAM) need to explicitly call `sync()` during rebase or a portion of the assets pooled can be stolen after rebase. Since ETH is the top pooled asset on Uniswap, it makes sense that we would want to encourage liquidity on the ETH-YAMv3 pool as well.
YAMv1 saw people adding liquidity on the YAMv1-ETH pool (>$100k worth at its peak), unknowingly putting those funds at risk.

Qmc1GpiLaPXRLsXw31R1RznKrMTnzmonbSn2kCXV.name: YIP-2: YAMv3 初始参数
Qmc1GpiLaPXRLsXw31R1RznKrMTnzmonbSn2kCXV.body:
rentElmore，BrockElmore，WillPrice，ClintonBembry和DanElitzer在过去两周与YAM社区的讨论基础上，提出了以下措施以启动YAMv3。我们提交此提案的动机是为了确保从V2到V3的有效过渡，以最公平的方式解决关键任务问题，以尽可能多的社区参与。我们认为这是前进的最佳途径，但这取决于社区，这不是详尽的可能变更清单，而且我们确实希望提交其他提案。

如提案力学提案中所述，任何人都可以提交其他提案，这些提案可能会取代和/或重复以下内容。

第1项：次要协议更新

我们提出以下协议更新。尽管有许多关于如何改进Yam协议的想法，但是我们发现谨慎的做法是集中精力在较小的更新上，以有限的开销改进V1。

-将储备资产更新为yUSD（yyCRV），其收益潜力比yCRV高
-将UniswapV2上的YAMv1/yCRVsync（）调用替换为YAMv3/yUSDsync（）调用
-硬编码建议（重新设置基准值50K）和仲裁（重新设置基准值200k）阈值
-将投票期从3天改为2天，以便更快地进行治理
-完整审核功能齐全的YAMv3协议

项目2：YAMv3奖励分配

我们建议在YAMv3/yUSD（yyCRV）UniswapV2LP池上建立一个单一的养殖池。奖励的第一周将在V3发布后一小时开始，总计330,000YAMv3。每周将减少30％的奖励，从而将总共1.1毫米的YAMv3代币分发给利益相关者。

我们还提出了1MMYAMv3社区基金，该基金在储备金以外的单独社区基金合同中持有。该基金将由V3治理机构控制，不会影响投票的法定人数，并且可以在社区认为合适的情况下使用。用途可能包括但不限于新的激励池或生态系统发展计划。

TL;DR:
-YAM/yUSDLP激励性权益池，每周初始发行33万YAMv3，每周减少30％，总计110万。
-110万YAMv3社区基金

第3项：从YAMv2到YAMv3的迁移

我们建议YAMv2持有者进行1：1迁移。将创建无期限的迁移合同，该合同将允许YAMv2持有人燃烧其YAMv2令牌，以换取YAMv3令牌。

TL;DR:
-通过迁移合同从V2到V31：1迁移

项目4：委托人奖励

我们建议利用在#saveyam治理提议时拍摄的快照，以利用“扁平且按比例缩放”的奖励模型来奖励代表。可以在这里找到代理人列表：https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yam-finance/yam-protocol/master/yam_delegator_snapshot_10650187_draft.json

这些奖励还将用于通过以下计算将YAMv3的总供应量推算为整数：

（YAMv3总供给）-（社区基金）-（LP总池奖励）-（YAMv2总供给）=（委托人奖励）

委托人的总奖励约为173,588.383YAMv3。我们建议将这些奖励的一半（大约86,794.192）平均分配给3,173名代表，向每个代表奖励大约27.354个YAMv3代币。其余的86,794.192个YAMv3代币将根据其在总投票中所占的百分比分配给代表。这种结构补偿了小额持有者的努力和产生的交易费，并补偿了所有持有者的比例影响。

这些委托人奖励将完全归属于V3发布。

TL;DR:
-大约173k的奖励，一半按比例平均分配给所有代表，一半按比例分配

提案摘要：

V3总供应量：6,000,000

协议更新：
-将储备资产更新为yUSD（yyCRV），其收益潜力比yCRV高。
-在UniswapV2YAMv3/yUSD池上调用sync（）
-硬编码建议（50K）和仲裁（200K）阈值
-将投票期限从2天改为2天
-完整审核功能齐全的YAMv3协议

农业和激励措施：
-YAM/yUSDLP池，接收330kYAMv3，每周减少30％，总计110万。
-1MYAMv3社区基金

迁移：
-从V2到V3的1：1迁移

委托人奖励：
-大约173k的奖励，一半平均分配给所有代表，一半根据投票捐款的线性比例分配

这项提议再次由最初发起YAM的个人提出，反映了我们对如何最好地进行的想法。最终，由YAM社区决定，并且满足最低要求的提案可能会取代或重复此提案。

QmdSZjHDZL1nGHRKq6G9wVwtxfHtBEu9HMgbK46b.name: YIP-3: 添加 ETH-YAMv3 Uniswap Pool 成为初始分配矿池
QmdSZjHDZL1nGHRKq6G9wVwtxfHtBEu9HMgbK46b.body:
该提案修改了YIP-2提案的条例2，将ETH-YAMv3 Uniswap V2池添加到YAMv3的初始激励分配中。如果通过，它将以以下方式分配初始的330,000 YAMv3奖励：
 
 * YAMv3 / yUSD Uniswap V2池：165,000 YAMS。
 * ETH-YAMv3 Uniswap V2池：165,000 YAMS。
 
这一变化是为了进一步促进的YAMv3-ETH桥接，也促进这两对货币之间的套利交易。 
 
YIP-2提案的其余部分将保持不变，这意味着每个池的奖励将每周减少30％，总计一百一十万的YAMv3代币将分发给涉众。
 
该提案将生效在其父级YIP-2提案之后1个区块，并且投票期为3天。 
 
 ** TL; DR：** 
 *更改YIP-2提案，将ETH-YAMv3和YAMv3 / yUSD Uniswap V2池之间的初始分配的330,000 YAMv3分配给初始奖励330,000 YAMv3。 
 * YIP-2提案中的所有其他内容均保持不变。
